name: Gerald the Mage
description:
Run, jump and have fun with the magician Gerald. Help him to overcome challenges of skill, timing and puzzle, in a journey full of humor. Gerald The Mage is a platform that arcade games with impossible style!

• STORY MODE
Three different worlds to face each one with always different difficulties and dangers. Learn to jump on the platforms to reach the end of each level. Use skill and ingenuity to overcome challenges and help Gerald return home to his wife.

• CHALLENGE MODE
Three legendary challenges, three very difficult levels to tackle without checkpoints. Get to the end and collect your prize in coins.

Support for Game Center leaderboards, now you can compare your best score with that of other players.

Collect all the magic coins on each level and use them to increase Gerald’s level and powers! Collect the PowerUps, discover and explore various hidden rooms.
